game.name: House spirit cat
game.shortDescription: House spirit cat is a visual novel with interactive features. It’s a story about a kind spirit of a house in the shape of a cat who is searching for a new owner. Will it find a new home or a place of despair? You are to choose.
game.shortDescriptionEn: House spirit cat is a visual novel with interactive features. It’s a story about a kind spirit of a house in the shape of a cat who is searching for a new owner. Will it find a new home or a place of despair? You are to choose.
